website_summaries.verdict: Ready for adventures on or off the trail - the Teva Strata Universal sandals pack a punch for being downright comfortable and supportive. This lightweight footwear is sought after for its rugged features, including the wide straps that hold the foot securely all the way. Whether you’re hiking, camping, or off to a weekend barbecue with friends, these sandals work great. Note, however, that they run a little narrow for some. It pays to get an actual fitting before making the final purchase.
pros: The Teva Strata Universal sandals have received so many five-star ratings for being exquisitely comfortable
Customers adore the broad straps which are relatively longer than the average hiking sandal
Many of the Teva Strata Universal reviews speak of its reliable quality
Hikers and campers love these sandals for being extremely supportive
Those who walk 7 miles or longer haven’t had issues with pain or fatigue
These sandals from Teva also get amazing feedback for their stylish look
Verified buyers also love that this footwear dries so quickly after getting wet
cons: A significant number of reviewers note that the Teva Strata Universal men’s sandals run narrow

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the size
customer_reviews.text: I have owned Teva's for decades and this sandal is literally a good inch shorter and more narrow than my previous pairs. I am returning it. I ordered a 9.
customer_reviews.author: mom2girls

customer_reviews.title: 5 months and garbage
customer_reviews.text: Teva used to last, the last pair went 2 years without a problem. This pair didn't even go 6 months and the strap ripped out. very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: dad

customer_reviews.title: Check sizing - the 12 I received was an inch shorter than 3 other pair of size 12 Texas I own.
customer_reviews.text: I love the sandals - however they were either marked the wrong size or run “extremely small”. I have three other pair of Teva - size 12 and the Strata was at least an inch shorter. Please check sizing - I would order 13 if that solved the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Brady27

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is the most supportive Teva made. It does run small so order one size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: i bought these after looking at reviews. nice so far. fit great and comfortable. i have the green. nice color. bought these due to the vibram soles...outstanding.. i got what i paid for george
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sandal to wear for an active, outdoor lifestyle
customer_reviews.text: This sandal is well designed for all day wear during active, outdoor activities. The straps are broad, padded and do not chafe. The sole provides excellent grip, arch support, and cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: The Akins

customer_reviews.title: Save your money, these sandals are garbage!
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable, heavy, too large and painful on my instead. Save your money, you're just paying for the name and it's not worth it. I am returning this item for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great looking sandals
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a size 12 but this model maybe the brand run small. First time getting Teva. Unfortunately I had to return i gave it 5 stars bc running small is not a a flaw just a condition per se
customer_reviews.author: Peacoat Rider

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable,
customer_reviews.text: My husband was very pleased with the Teva sandals that I bought him. He finds that they fit well and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, good support, good looking
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality, good foot support and very comfortable. I bought a second pair!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: Great Teva quality, but too small. I recently blew out my Teva Tanza's after two years of almost daily wear; they were a size 10. I ordered the Strata in a 10, but they look to be at least a whole size smaller. My toes hang over the end. I'm going to try a size 11. My dogs are howlin' for some comfy new sandals in this heat...
customer_reviews.author: William pearson

customer_reviews.title: Order 1 size bigger than normal
customer_reviews.text: This sandal runs about 1 size too small so order up a size. Super comfy! Love these!
customer_reviews.author: S Walls

customer_reviews.title: Great Men’s Sandal
customer_reviews.text: Well made, beautiful color and very comfortable. My husband loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Celie M. Baussan

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable Fit
customer_reviews.text: For people with foot problems . . . . these sandals are great. Super comfortable and excellent support.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Shigihara

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Pattern on top surface of sandals irritates my sole. May return them
customer_reviews.author: john crilly

customer_reviews.title: Hurrah for Amazon reviewers
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a pair of these Strata sandals and followed the advice of previous reviewers--order a size up--so I got it right the first time. I was replacing a pair of size 12 Terra Fi 4 sandals that had served me well. I ordered a size 13 in this model and found they fit me perfectly. The footbed in the Strata has more cushion than my old sandals, which I like. The straps hug my feet in the same spots, but the Strata hook and loop closures feel more secure. The look of the straps and sandals overall is plainer, while more finished. I look forward to years of wear from these great sandals!
customer_reviews.author: John O.

customer_reviews.title: It is an upgrade and great sandal.
customer_reviews.text: Yes sandal is much nicer than other Tevas. What nobody mentions is the actual strap is more industrial and thicker than any other current models. I also have more padding around the buckle bracket side area . So there is much more than the soul that makes this sandal an upgrade .
customer_reviews.author: Gadget lover

customer_reviews.title: I ordered size 12 and they are at least one size too small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered size 12 and they are at least one size too small.
customer_reviews.author: David D.

customer_reviews.title: way too small
customer_reviews.text: believe the reports about being too small. size 9 look more like a 7 to me. my toes hang over the edge. ridiculous. cmon teva your better than that.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Dreese

product_meta.title: Teva Men's Strata Universal Sport Sandal
product_meta.description: Not of this stratosphere, the Strata Universal is Teva’s most lightweight, ruggedly awesome hiking sandal to date. Featuring Vibram Megagrip soles with small micro-traction lugs for unbeatable grip, this quick-dry style is in a league of its own.
feature_bullets: Not of this stratosphere, the Strata Universal is Teva’s most lightweight, ruggedly awesome hiking sandal to date. Featuring Vibram Megagrip soles with small micro-traction lugs for unbeatable grip, this quick-dry style is in a league of its own.
